name: Orbs CCG, the asynchronous digital collectible card game!
blurb: The Orbs CCG Kickstarter has moved.

rewards.reward: *MICRO*\r\n\r\nYou'll be added to the email list, to stay up-to-date with new developments, and be notified when its available. You'll also be eligible for a special badge indicating you were a MICRO backer of the Kickstarter.

*BASIC*\r\n\r\nYou'll get access to the Beta! In addition, you'll also get TWO STARTER DECKS of your choice ($20 value), FIVE BOOSTER PACKS ($15 value), and a TOURNAMENT TOKEN allowing you to join a tournament when regular tournaments start ($2 value)! You will also get a special badge indicating you were a BASIC backer of the Kickstarter.

*EARLY BIRD ADVENTURER*

ONLY 20 EARLY BIRD SPOTS -- GET YOURS WHILE THEY LAST!!

You'll get access to the Beta, plus THREE STARTER DECKS ($30 value), TWELVE BOOSTER PACKS ($36 value), and TWO TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($4 value). You will also get a special badge indicating you were a ADVENTURER of the Kickstarter.

*ADVENTURER*\r\n\r\nYou'll get access to the Beta, plus THREE STARTER DECKS ($30 value), TWELVE BOOSTER PACKS ($36 value), and TWO TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($4 value).  You will also get a special badge indicating you were a ADVENTURER of the Kickstarter.

*WIZARD*\r\n\r\nYou'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), TWENTY BOOSTER PACKS ($60 value), and THREE TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($6 value). You will also get a special badge indicating you were a WIZARD of the Kickstarter.

*EARLY-BIRD MAGE*

ONLY 20 SPOTS -- GET YOURS WHILE THEY LAST!!

You'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), FORTY BOOSTER PACKS ($120 value) and FIVE TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($10 value).  In addition, you will get a special badge indicating you were a MAGE backer of the Kickstarter.

*MAGE*\r\n\r\nYou'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), FORTY BOOSTER PACKS ($120 value) and FIVE TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($10 value).  In addition, you will get a special badge indicating you were a MAGE backer of the Kickstarter.

*WARLOCK*\r\n\r\nYou'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), SEVENTY BOOSTER PACKS ($210 value) and TEN TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($20 value). In addition, you will also get a special badge indicating you were a WARLOCK backer of the Kickstarter.

*MASTER*\r\n\r\nYou'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), SEVENTY BOOSTER PACKS ($210 value) and THIRTY TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($60 value). You'll also receive 1 COPY OF EVERY SINGLE CARD IN THE GAME at launch ($500 value). In addition, you will also get a special badge indicating you were a MASTER backer of the Kickstarter.

*GRANDMASTER*\r\n\r\nYou'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), ONE HUNDREND BOOSTER PACKS ($300 value) and FIFTY TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($100 value). You'll also receive 2 COPIES OF EVERY SINGLE CARD IN THE GAME at launch ($1000 value). In addition, you will also get a special badge indicating you were a GRANDMASTER backer of the Kickstarter.

*UBERMASTER* You'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), ONE HUNDREND FIFTY BOOSTER PACKS ($450 value) and ONE HUNDRED TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($200 value). You'll also receive 3 COPIES OF EVERY SINGLE CARD IN THE GAME at launch ($1500 value). In addition, you will also get a special badge indicating you were a UBERMASTER backer of the Kickstarter.

*SUPERUBERMASTER* You'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), ONE HUNDREND FIFTY BOOSTER PACKS ($450 value) and ONE HUNDRED TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($200 value). You'll also receive 4 COPIES OF EVERY SINGLE CARD IN THE GAME at launch ($1500 value). Plus, if you'd consent, YOUR LIKENESS will be made into art for a card. In addition, you will also get a special badge indicating you were a SUPERUBERMASTER backer of the Kickstarter.

*DESIGNMASTER* You'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), ONE HUNDREND FIFTY BOOSTER PACKS ($450 value) and ONE HUNDRED TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($200 value). You'll also receive 4 COPIES OF EVERY SINGLE CARD IN THE GAME at launch ($1500 value). Plus, you get to work with us to design a card for the game (both function and art). In addition, you will also get a special badge indicating you were a DESIGNMASTER backer of the Kickstarter.

*GODLIKE* You'll get access to the Beta, plus FOUR STARTER DECKS ($40 value), ONE HUNDREND FIFTY BOOSTER PACKS ($450 value) and ONE HUNDRED TOURNAMENT TOKENS ($200 value). You'll also receive 4 COPIES OF EVERY SINGLE CARD IN THE GAME AT LAUNCH ($$MEGA$$ value). In addition, you will also get a special badge indicating you were a GODLIKE backer of the Kickstarter.
